A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They ruined Luke Skywalker in this film. It's a very beautiful film to look at\, but the script is very weak\, characters make decisions that make no logical sense\, characters' legacies from previous films are destroyed\, and this film also ignores all lore/in-universe rules established in the first 6 films. No film has ever irritated me so much as this.
